ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I actually recommend this course for students with both excellent Arabic and deep understanding of the early Islamic history.

I would recommend the course to students who would like to improve their understanding in the Quran and its exegesis because the course gives the opprotunity to read some of the early commentaries on the Quran as well as some of the modern works on them which represent the several scholarly opinions in the field.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: My previous responses can work here as well.
The course improved my proficiency in reading classical arabic texts. It also helped me have an idea about the modern interpretations of the Quran, which I think was very useful in my paper.
